attributes.action: Make Government honour the commitment to take 3000 unaccompied refugee children.
attributes.background: The Home Office has said it will stop accepting unaccompanied refugee children under the Dubs Amendment despite having only accepted 350 of a proposed 3000. There are an estimated 90000 unaccompanied migrant children across Europe. We must do more to welcome and protect these vulnerable children.

rejection.details:
The following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/183943
